articles.title: Trump threatens steep tariffs on trade with the European Union — and on iPhones - NPR
articles.description: President Trump told reporters he is ready to slap 50% tariffs on European Union products starting June 1 — and 25% tariffs on iPhones by the end of June.
articles.content:
President Trump on Friday said he had run out of patience with trade negotiators from the European Union and has decided to set the tariff on imports at 50% starting on June 1.
"I just said, 'It's t… [+3367 chars]
